SELECT all_tab_cols.table_name , all_tab_cols.column_name , all_tab_cols.data_type , all_tab_cols.data_length , (SELECT all_col_comments.comments FROM all_col_comments WHERE all_col_comments.owner = all_tab_cols.owner AND all_col_comments.table_name = all_tab_cols.table_name AND all_col_comments.column_name = all_tab_cols.column_name) AS column_comments , all_cons_columns.position FROM all_tab_cols LEFT OUTER JOIN all_constraints ON 1 = 1 AND all_constraints.owner = all_tab_cols.owner AND all_constraints.table_name = all_tab_cols.table_name AND all_constraints.constraint_type = 'P' LEFT OUTER JOIN all_cons_columns ON 1 = 1 AND all_cons_columns.owner = all_tab_cols.owner AND all_cons_columns.constraint_name = all_constraints.constraint_name AND all_cons_columns.table_name = all_tab_cols.table_name AND all_cons_columns.column_name = all_tab_cols.column_name WHERE 1 = 1
AND all_tab_cols.owner = #owner#
#tableNames[]#
ORDER BY all_tab_cols.table_name , all_tab_cols.column_id
